HomePage.footerAbout: At Piza, we are committed to providing diverse services for your comfort and convenience—from smart home systems and house reservations to hotel bookings. With us, life becomes simpler, smarter, and more enjoyable. Our services include an easy-to-use platform, personalized solutions, and 24/7 support. Welcome to a world of innovation and quality!

AboutUs.mentorDesc: With years of experience in software development and technology project management, he leads our team.
AboutUs.storyDesc1: Welcome to NextElites! We are a team of web development specialists who provide innovative real estate solutions using advanced technologies.
AboutUs.storyDesc2: We are committed to building modern, scalable, and user-friendly web experiences. Our team constantly strives to deliver innovation and quality in every project.
AboutUs.storyDesc3: In real estate, we've created a platform that makes buying, selling, and renting properties easier for customers. Using advanced technologies, we provide smart search capabilities, high-quality image viewing, and direct communication with real estate consultants.
AboutUs.servicesDesc1: At Next Elites, we offer a range of real estate services that help customers make the best choices for property investment, purchase, or rental. Our team, with extensive experience and knowledge in the real estate market, provides valuable guidance to clients.
AboutUs.servicesDesc2: Our platform enables advanced search based on location, price, area, and other features. Additionally, using artificial intelligence, we provide personalized recommendations tailored to each user's needs and preferences.
AboutUs.servicesDesc3: We also offer legal consultation services for real estate transactions, property valuation, and rental management. Our goal is to create a hassle-free and transparent experience for all clients.
AboutUs.qualityDesc: We are committed to delivering high-quality, flawless products
AboutUs.innovationDesc: We constantly seek new and creative ways to solve problems
AboutUs.collaborationDesc: We work closely with our clients and real estate consultants to achieve the best results
AboutUs.addressText: Mazandaran, Sari, Darya Road, 100 meters past Donya-ye Arezoo-ha, Sepehr Building
AboutUs.subject: Subject
AboutUs.faq1Question: How can I find the property I'm looking for?
AboutUs.faq1Answer: You can use the advanced search filters on our website to find properties based on location, price, area, and other features. You can also contact our real estate consultants to help you find the best option.
AboutUs.faq2Question: How can I list my property for sale or rent on your website?
AboutUs.faq2Answer: To list your property on our site, you first need to register. Then through your user panel, you can upload your property information and photos. After approval by our team, your property will be listed on the site.
AboutUs.faq3Question: Do you provide legal consultation services?
AboutUs.faq3Answer: Yes, we provide legal consultation services for real estate transactions. Our legal consultants can assist you throughout the process of buying, selling, or renting properties.
